org.apache.juneau.dto.swagger

Class Operation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.dto.swagger.Operation

  • @Bean(properties="operationId,summary,description,tags,externalDocs,consumes,produces,parameters,responses,schemes,deprecated,security")
public class Operation
extends Object
    Describes a single API operation on a path.
    Example:

    { "tags": [ "pet" ], "summary": "Updates a pet in the store with form data", "description": "", "operationId": "updatePetWithForm", "consumes": [ "application/x-www-form-urlencoded" ], "produces": [ "application/json", "application/xml" ], "parameters": [ { "name": "petId", "in": "path", "description": "ID of pet that needs to be updated", "required": true, "type": "string" }, { "name": "name", "in": "formData", "description": "Updated name of the pet", "required": false, "type": "string" }, { "name": "status", "in": "formData", "description": "Updated status of the pet", "required": false, "type": "string" } ], "responses": { "200": { "description": "Pet updated." }, "405": { "description": "Invalid input" } }, "security": [ { "petstore_auth": [ "write:pets", "read:pets" ] } ] }

      • getTags

        public List<String> getTags()
        Bean property getter: tags.

        A list of tags for API documentation control. Tags can be used for logical grouping of operations by resources or any other qualifier.

        Returns:
        The value of the tags property on this bean, or null if it is not set.

      • getSummary

        public String getSummary()
        Bean property getter: summary.

        A short summary of what the operation does. For maximum readability in the swagger-ui, this field SHOULD be less than 120 characters.

        Returns:
        The value of the summary property on this bean, or null if it is not set.

      • getOperationId

        public String getOperationId()
        Bean property getter: operationId.

        Unique string used to identify the operation. The id MUST be unique among all operations described in the API. Tools and libraries MAY use the operationId to uniquely identify an operation, therefore, it is recommended to follow common programming naming conventions.

        Returns:
        The value of the operationId property on this bean, or null if it is not set.

      • setOperationId

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        This object (for method chaining).

      • getConsumes

        public List<MediaType> getConsumes()
        Bean property getter: consumes.

        A list of MIME types the operation can consume. This overrides the consumes definition at the Swagger Object. An empty value MAY be used to clear the global definition. Value MUST be as described under Mime Types.

        Returns:
        The value of the consumes property on this bean, or null if it is not set.

      • getParameters

        public List<ParameterInfo> getParameters()
        Bean property getter: parameters.

        A list of parameters that are applicable for this operation. If a parameter is already defined at the Path Item, the new definition will override it, but can never remove it. The list MUST NOT include duplicated parameters. A unique parameter is defined by a combination of a name and location. The list can use the Reference Object to link to parameters that are defined at the Swagger Object's parameters. There can be one "body" parameter at most.

        Returns:
        The value of the parameters property on this bean, or null if it is not set.

      • setParameters

        public Operation setParameters(List<ParameterInfo> parameters)
        Bean property setter: parameters.

        A list of parameters that are applicable for this operation. If a parameter is already defined at the Path Item, the new definition will override it, but can never remove it. The list MUST NOT include duplicated parameters. A unique parameter is defined by a combination of a name and location. The list can use the Reference Object to link to parameters that are defined at the Swagger Object's parameters. There can be one "body" parameter at most.

        Parameters:
        parameters - The new value for the parameters property on this bean.
        Returns:
        This object (for method chaining).

      • getSchemes

        public List<String> getSchemes()
        Bean property getter: schemes.

        The transfer protocol for the operation. Values MUST be from the list: "http", "https", "ws", "wss". The value overrides the Swagger Object schemes definition.

        Returns:
        The value of the schemes property on this bean, or null if it is not set.

      • getDeprecated

        public Boolean getDeprecated()
        Bean property getter: deprecated.

        Declares this operation to be deprecated. Usage of the declared operation should be refrained. Default value is false.

        Returns:
        The value of the deprecated property on this bean, or null if it is not set.

        Returns:
        This object (for method chaining).

      • getSecurity

        public List<Map<String,List<String>>> getSecurity()
        Bean property getter: security.

        A declaration of which security schemes are applied for this operation. The list of values describes alternative security schemes that can be used (that is, there is a logical OR between the security requirements). This definition overrides any declared top-level security. To remove a top-level security declaration, an empty array can be used.

        Returns:
        The value of the security property on this bean, or null if it is not set.

      • setSecurity

        public Operation setSecurity(List<Map<String,List<String>>> security)
        Bean property setter: security.

        A declaration of which security schemes are applied for this operation. The list of values describes alternative security schemes that can be used (that is, there is a logical OR between the security requirements). This definition overrides any declared top-level security. To remove a top-level security declaration, an empty array can be used.

        Parameters:
        security - The new value for the security property on this bean.
        Returns:
        This object (for method chaining).
